DOC.detailed_description: The cognitive test battery consist test list , administer order give . 1 . Digit Span 2 . California Verbal Learning Test 3 . Symbol Digit Modalities Test 4 . Letter Number Sequencing 5 . California Verbal Learning Test Delay 6 . Paced Auditory Serial Addition Test 7 . D-KEFS Verbal Fluency 8 . D-KEFS Color-Word 9 . WASI Vocabulary 10 . WASI Matrix Reasoning
DOC.criteria: SCI Between age 25 49 year old Duration injury must 5 10 year AIS grade A B Nonambulatory ( wheelchair dependent ) At least 20/60 minimum acuity bad eye Snell Eye Exam A score ≥24 Montreal Cognitive Assessment English literate Able provide inform consent Agematched nonSCI Between age 25 49 year old At least 20/60 minimum acuity bad eye Snell Eye Exam A score ≥24 Montreal Cognitive Assessment English literate Able provide inform consent Older nonSCI Between age 55 65 year old At least 20/60 minimum acuity bad eye Snell Eye Exam A score ≥24 Montreal Cognitive Assessment English literate Able provide inform consent Acute illness infection Documented history : Controlled uncontrolled hypertension Diabetes mellitus Recent illicit drug abuse ( medical chart , within past 6months ) Epilepsy seizures Neurodegenerative disease include Alzheimer 's disease , Parkinson 's disease , Dementia , Stroke , Multiple sclerosis Severe TBI ( identify TBI screen tool ) Any significant history psychiatric disease/disorders : Posttraumatic stress disorder schizophrenia Bipolar disease Substance abuse dependence within past 6 month MRI additional exclusion : Subject inform medically unsafe receive regular MRI part medical care Pregnant Right hand Prone claustrophobia Metal body include : metal fragment piece subject 's eye part body brain stimulators pacemaker , implant electrical device pump aneurysm clip metallic prosthesis ( include metal pin rod , heart valve ) internal hearing aid permanent eyeliner shrapnel fragment pierce take
